mean_cn: n.货币，货币制度；铸币造币（权）
mean_en: the system of money used in a particular country; the coins used in a particular place or at a particular time; coins of a particular type
sentence: I don\u0027t understand most foreign coinage.
sentence_trans: 对于大部分的国外货币制度，我都不太明白。
word_etyma: coin硬币 ＋ age表示集合名词、总称 → coinage造币；[金融]货币制度
